title: Caribbean piña colada trifle
description: Having a Caribbean-themed dinner? Try this twist on trifle with mango jam, coconut custard, rum syrup, pineapple and kiwi fruit.Equipment and preparation: you will need a hand-held electric whisk and a piping bag with a plain nozzle. Plus a cocktail umbrella, curly straw and swizzle stick for decoration.
ingredients: 2 very ripe mangos, peeled and cubed
coconut-flavoured rum, such as Malibu, to taste
1 pineapple, ⅔ cut into thin rings, core removed
